This technique utilizes the unique mechanism of fifth puppet of the [[White Secret Technique: The Chikamatsu Collection of Ten Puppets|Chikamatsu Collection]]. Ramming it into the target headfirst, five metallic tendrils release from holes in its scalp and pierce the target, as well as anything else behind it.

==Trivia==
* While this technique was first seen in the manga during [[Sakura]] and [[Chiyo]]'s battle with [[Sasori]], its name was only revealed in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2]]''.
